steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9q7pn","text":"Cooking Pot","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2esrj","text":"One Package of Instant Ramen","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qpjs","text":"Chopsticks/Fork","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b605l","text":"Egg","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rdbs","text":"Any Frozen Veggies (Corn, Peas, etc)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1p6km","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2j3t7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6u22u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B4EC50E0314311EE8455FDE3E254A788","height":375,"id":394473,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"2qa6\",\"text\":\"Image from https://damndelicious.net/2014/10/13/easy-homemade-ramen/\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[{\"key\":0,\"offset\":11,\"length\":57}],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{\"0\":{\"type\":\"link\",\"mutability\":\"MUTABLE\",\"data\":{\"guid\":\"BE6B98F0314311EEADC40A58A9FEAC02\",\"url\":\"https://damndelicious.net/2014/10/13/easy-homemade-ramen\"}}}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhmb7z9p.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhjb7z9p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhkb7z9p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhib7z9p.webp","width":500}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cc10a","text":"Pour 2.5 cups of water into a cooking pot and put on a high-heat stove. Wait until the water boils.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5134a","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c0d3k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D43BC200314311EE8455FDE3E254A788","height":406,"id":394479,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhtb7z9p.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhrb7z9p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhsb7z9p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbhqb7z9p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc7vq","text":"After the water starts boiling, add the Ramen and Sauce packet from the Instant Ramen package and cook for two minutes. To make the final product more tasty, add any frozen vegetables such as corn, peas, lettuce to the mix.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":225,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ec439","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"85BCABE0316011EEBD9CBF761A9A6E8C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"212","unit":12}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gep3","text":"While cooking, occasionally stir the noodles and submerge the noodles  in water to make sure it cooks properly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cog9u","text":"While plating the ramen, there are some optional toppings to consider putting in your ramen such as:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"669vi","text":"Soft-boiled eggs (Boil eggs on high heat for 7 minutes, give it an ice bath, and peel)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9oal9","text":"Fried eggs (Fry egg with a little cooking oil)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ecri","text":"Fresh scallions","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41sjr","text":"Pan-fried spam ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eli0r","text":"Shiitake Mushrooms","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9vd8","text":"Cooked Sesame Seeds / Sesame Oil","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: How to Cook Ramen
